headline: Will Audit-Driven Reforms and Regulatory Pressure Change UnitedHealth Group’s (UNH) Medicare Advantage Narrative?
summary: In recent months, UnitedHealth Group has responded to independent audits by committing to 23 operational reforms across Medicare Advantage, care management, and Optum Rx, while contending with Department of Justice investigations and political pressure for lower premiums as COVID-era ACA subsidies expire. This combination of internal overhaul, legal scrutiny, and policy uncertainty is reshaping how the company balances growth, compliance, and profitability in its core insurance and health...
